attributes.action: remove smoking whilst driving from the highwaycode
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
why should us smokers be punished ??

there is other things more distracting than smoking like 

a bee/wasp flying in the window 

kids in the car that dont shut up and scream 

in fact i think that seeing a female walking on the pavement in a short skirt is more distracting so ban that too (in fact no dont)

i tell you what just ban driving ????

reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
